Living in fear of monsters, 
abandoning the struggle. 
A species that halts its evolution 
is destined to perish— 
those recent outsiders, 
will they be a remedy or a bane? 
It'll be intriguing to watch.

and many are struggling to keep up. 
There are times when you're challenged
